amendment.description: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-395 to ensure that military aircraft overflights, units of special air space, and flight training routes are allowed over wilderness areas designated by this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 116-395 to ensure that military aircraft overflights, units of special air space, and flight training routes are allowed over wilderness areas designated by this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 419 - 1 (Roll no. 66).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Cunningham amendment (A008) Agreed to by recorded vote: 419 - 1 (Roll no. 66).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Cunningham.
